root.name: Cristiano Ronaldo Freestyle
root.description: PC Game Requirements· System: Windows XP SP2, Vista, Windows 7, MacOSx 10.6 (Snow leopard)· Processor: Single Core 1.2 Ghz ( XP SP2) and Single Core 2.4 Ghz or superior (Vista, Windows 7). Any INTEL Based MAC.· System memory min of 1Gb (XP SP2) and 2Gb (Vista, Windows 7, MAC)· Open GL 2 compatible VGA Card with 128 Mb min· Supports Keyboard but GamePad is recommended
